snippet: Helping immigrants gain access to health insurance is both sound fiscal policy and good public health policy....
abstract: Editorial urges Obama administration to support California lawmakers seeking to allow undocumented immigrants to purchase insurance policies on state's health insurance marketplace without federal subsidies; notes Affordable Care Act specifically bars undocumented immigrants from using federal or state insurance marketplaces with or without tax subsidies; underscores degree to which change would be sound fiscal and health policy, and emphasizes that it would be fair thing to do.
lead_paragraph: Helping immigrants gain access to health insurance is both sound fiscal policy and good public health policy.

headline.print_headline: California’s Nifty Idea on Immigrant Health Care
headline.main: California’s Nifty Idea on Immigrant Health Care

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
